title: Christmas pudding and PX sherry trifle
description: Having friends or family over after Christmas? This sherry-soaked trifle made with leftover Christmas pudding is the perfect dessert to keep the festive indulgence going.
ingredients: 8 fresh black figs, cut into quarters
150g/5½oz mixed crumbled pecans and toasted flaked almonds
1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways
